Package com.winterhavenmc.savagegraveyards.listeners

Class BukkitEventListener

java.lang.Object
com.winterhavenmc.savagegraveyards.listeners.BukkitEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, org.bukkit.event.Listener
public final class BukkitEventListener extends Object implements EventListener
Implements Listener for player events
